reviews.review_msg: Cheryl is knowledgeable about dance Education and teaches it by having you practice it. Your attitude determines how much you get out of the course. Embrace it! I learned a lot from this class that I will use in my future career. Her grading is really easy as long as you show up and try. She is not very good with technology, though.

Celeste is definitely one of a kind. She is always upbeat and energetic which is a different from a lot of different profs. The class is not a lot of work, but it does require you being totally involved with everything. This is one of those classes where you get marked based on effort, so as long as you try and have fun, you should get an A.
